name: Cycles (EfeKaracar)
description:
CYCLES

__________

In this game, you have one goal. Make sure mill wheels run at all times.

To do that, control your scouts to find and dig potential water spots to generate water supplies.

With water supplies, Mill will produce more "life", in form of villagers. Every villager adds 1 population.

You win the game by reaching 100 population.

Your challenge is to do it before timer ends, which is the start of Winter.

You only have 10 minute to beat the game. Find all those water pools!

Scouts = blue people.

CONTROLS

____________

WSAD - Move camera
(You can also move camera by using your mouse, simply move it to the edges)

Right click - move scout

Left click - select scout

Scout will automatically start digging when you
right click to move on a digging spot.

by Damarus (music) & Efe Karacar (art, code, level design, game design)
